footer.heading: Pren-te un descans de ser adult

introBlock.title: Fem que rentar la roba sigui fàcil i ràpid per a tothom
introBlock.subtitle: Ja siguis un client que busca opcions d'autoservei amb grans preus a través del nostre club de fidelitat, un administrador de propietats que vol oferir serveis de bugaderia als seus llogaters, o un restaurant que necessita llençols i tovallons nets, t'ho posem fàcil. Gaudeix de solucions fiables que s'adapten a les teves necessitats mentre nosaltres ens ocupem de la feina dura.

propertiesCTA.heading: Serveis de bugaderia per a gestors de propietats
propertiesCTA.title: Mantingues les teves propietats funcionant sense problemes amb Dash & Dry
propertiesCTA.content: Augmenta la satisfacció dels inquilins i facilita la teva feina amb els nostres serveis de bugaderia. Ens encarreguem de la feina bruta, perquè puguis centrar-te en el teu negoci i fins i tot guanyar diners extres.

restaurantCTA.heading: Serveis de bugaderia per a restaurants
restaurantCTA.title: Mantingues els teus llençols frescos amb Dash & Dry
restaurantCTA.content1: Deixa'ns encarregar-nos dels llençols i tovallons bruts, perquè tu et puguis concentrar en els teus xefs i preparar plats deliciosos.
restaurantCTA.content2: Nosaltres ens encarreguem de la bugaderia mentre tu serves la màgia!

laundryCTA.heading: Serveis de Bugaderia amb Recollida i Lliurament
laundryCTA.title: Estalvia Temps amb el Servei de Recollida i Lliurament amb Dash & Dry
laundryCTA.content: Deixa de passar hores rentant roba. Nosaltres la recollim, rentem i la tornem mentre et concentres en el que realment importa. És fàcil, convenient i sense complicacions.

pricing.heading: Preus de Bugaderia Autoservei
pricing.title: Preus que s'Adapten a les teves Necessitats
pricing.content: Oferim preus competitius a les nostres rentadores i assecadores d'autoservei, amb estalvis addicionals quan fas servir la nostra Targeta de Fidelitat.
pricing.feats: Detergent, Suavitzant de roba, Tecnologia ActiveOzone Mist
pricing.dryerFeats: Calor Alt, Calor Mitjà, Sense Calor
pricing.descriptionDryer: Assecat ràpid per a qualsevol càrrega

shopCustomers.title: Clients de la botiga
shopCustomers.content: Oferim bugaderia d'autoservei amb rentadores, assecadores i un programa de fidelització. Gaudeix d'una bugaderia fàcil amb detergent, suavitzant i desinfectant inclosos.

properties.title: Gestors de Propietats
properties.content: Associa't amb nosaltres per ampliar els teus serveis immobiliaris. Ofereix serveis de bugaderia als llogaters i guanya ingressos addicionals amb comissions per cada comanda.

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.content: Oferim serveis de bugaderia professional per a restaurants, garantint la neteja i un temps de resposta ràpid per al teu establiment.

pickupDelivery.title: Recollida i Lliurament
pickupDelivery.content: Recollim, rentem, assecem i lliurem la teva roba. Servei ràpid i còmode per a la teva vida ocupada. AVIAT!

IndexPage.title: next-intl example - Home Page - Catalan
IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of Catalan

hero.title: Customize Your Laundry Experience
hero.subtitle: Your money, your time, your way !

attention.textOne: Let's face it, doing laundry sucks, and we get it
attention.textTwo: Our mission is to ease back that burden.
attention.textThree: It's simple, do more with your time, while saving you money!
attention.textFive: located in the heart of Barcelona, Spain.

cards.title: Save Some Cash
cards.subtitle: The average European households spends an average of €200 to €600 on laundry detergents annually. Factor in the electricity, water, and machine maintenance, and the costs add up.
cards.content: Let us take care of the laundry, so you can enjoy some extra money in your pocket.

cards.title: It's your time
cards.subtitle: European families spend over 480 hours a year on laundry. Dash & Dry helps you reclaim that time. No more missing coffee dates, skipping workouts, or catching up with your friends over drinks
cards.content: Get your schedule back and do the things you love.

content.title: Our Location
content: We're not just a spot to wash clothes; we're a part of the Barcelona community. By the people, for the people. We've teamed up with local businesses to make laundry more exciting.
While your clothes are spinning, explore the neighborhood, grab a free coffee from a nearby café, hit the gym, or enjoy sweet discounts at local restaurants
content.cta: Check us out on Google Maps

content.title: Built for Efficiency
content: Our machines at Dash & Dry are built for efficiency. We have 5 high-capacity LG Titan Commercial Washers in 20kg, 15kg, and 3 - 12kg sizes, ensuring we can handle any load. Our 2 dryers, the LG Titan C Light Dryer Model, each with a 15kg capacity, are designed to dry large loads quickly without compromising quality.

This setup means you spend less time waiting for your laundry and more time on the things that matter. Whether it's a full week's worth of clothes or just a few items, our machines get the job done fast.

content.title: The Right Temperature for Every Type of Laundry
content: At Dash & Dry, we offer versatile temperature options to suit all your laundry needs. Our washers let you choose from four temperature settings—Cold, 30c, 45c, and 60c—so you can wash delicate fabrics without worry or tackle heavily soiled clothes with confidence. When it's time to dry, our LG Titan C Light Dryers provide four temperature options: High, Medium, Low, and No Heat.
Whether you're drying thick towels or delicate garments, you can select the ideal temperature for each load. Our flexible temperature settings ensure your laundry gets the care it deserves.

content.title: Build Community Ties with Special Offers
content: Now comes the fun part. While your laundry is being handled, check out our list of neighborhood partnerships. Dash & Dry has teamed up with local businesses to offer you exclusive discounts and perks. Whether it's a free coffee, discounted gym sessions, or special rates at local eateries, we've got something for everyone.

These partnerships aren't just about saving you money—they're about supporting our neighborhood's growth and connecting you with the local community. So go ahead, take advantage of these cool deals, and enjoy everything our vibrant area has to offer.

PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).

Error.title: Something went wr   ong!
Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
